name: Monsieur Fourier n'est plus furieux
description:
Highly interactive art piece which generates shapes of any complexity. The user can (but does not have to) take control of the drawing by modifying the algorithm through its graphical representation ("the machine") and by setting size and brightness of the pen.

Based on the mathematical principle of the Fourier series.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourier_series


Notes:

- The work reacts to keyboard input only after the first click into the canvas or a hit of the [return key].
- Sound on! Click once into the canvas to start sound.

This piece has a DRAW and an EDIT mode. Toggle between them using the [return key].


+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Take control in DRAW mode                                |
+----------------------------------------------------------+


  Enter EDIT mode                               [return key]  

  Toggle DYNAMIC BRIGHTNESS                              [b]

  Change PEN SIZE                              [mouse wheel]

  DELETE drawing                               [right-click]
  
  Graceful END                                   [space bar]


+----------------------------------------------------------+
| Take control in EDIT mode                                |
+----------------------------------------------------------+


  Return to DRAW mode                           [return key]
  

While mouse cursor is placed outside of any object:

  ADD or REMOVE segments                       [mouse wheel]
  
  Change PEN SIZE                                    [+] [-]


While mouse cursor is placed over the center of a circle:

  Change segment RADIUS                        [mouse wheel] 
                                 or [hold left mouse button]

  Change segment SPEED                               [+] [-]


Place mouse cursor over the pen, then:

  Change PEN SIZE                              [mouse wheel]
  
  Change PEN BRIGHTNESS                              [+] [-]

  MOVE somewhere else                       [click and drag]
